name: Shipping Insurance for WooCommerce
author: WPCocktail

sections.description:
Boost your store’s average order value (AOV) and enhance customer satisfaction with the Shipping Insurance for WooCommerce plugin. This essential plugin empowers your customers to protect their orders during transit while streamlining your claims management process. Offering shipping insurance has never been easier! Join the growing number of WooCommerce store owners who trust our plugin to deliver peace of mind to their customers.

Discover More with the Pro Version:
Upgrade to the Pro version of Shipping Insurance for WooCommerce for advanced features and enhanced flexibility. For more details and to explore all the Pro version benefits, click here: WPCocktail Shipping Insurance for WooCommerce Pro Version.

Key Features:
* Offer shipping insurance as an optional add-on during checkout, giving customers the choice to secure their purchases and increase their confidence in your store

Pro Version Features:
üõ°Ô∏è Choose Your Insurance Rate Type: Opt between a fixed amount or a dynamic percentage based on the order value. Plus, set minimum and maximum insurance amounts to suit your e-commerce business strategy.
üéØ Tailored Display Position: You‚Äôre in control. Decide exactly where the insurance option appears on your checkout page, ensuring optimal user experience and increasing conversion rates.
üìù Specify the Insurance Rate: Whether it‚Äôs a set value or a percentage, our plugin allows you to determine the insurance rate seamlessly.
üìÑ Integrated Insurance Terms Link: Keep your customers informed and secure. Direct them to your terms and conditions page right from the checkout for full transparency.
üìä Efficient Insurance List Management: Have a clear view of all your insurance options in one place. Plus, our intuitive page flip feature ensures easy navigation.
üíº Data Export Functionality: Need a report? Easily export all your insurance-related data with just one click, helping you make informed business decisions.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/e-commerce-shipping-insurance directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Shipping to configure the plugin settings.
sections.faq: Please visit the plugin’s documentation and support forum for answers to common questions, or contact our support team directly.
